nodes.bodyText: In your assertNext you can actually assert whether or not the update made the correct operation
you need to block these calls otherwise this will never execute
Let's call these test files DigitalTwinAsyncTests and DigitalTwinTests
this call needs to be blocked, else the process will exit before the async call completes.
I had the same comment. I will fix this in another PR.
shouldn't there be a assert here on whatever was updated?
